item.description:
Update

Got a question on this via email - we are seeing the 7:30 showing, 7:00 is the time for us to meet. You can buy tickets online at https://tickets.landm....

Hello all - I am going to put this into an email also. Jared is sick - so I'm organizing. I will be wearing my red meetup hat. We'll meet on the balcony overlooking the lobby. When you walk into the lobby - look up! You should see me!

Synopsis

This movie is a new film directed by Sam Mendes (American Beauty, Revolutionary Road). John Krasinski (Office (American Series)), Maya Rudolph (SNL), Allison Janney (West Wing), Jeff Daniels (Dumb and Dumber), and Maggie Gyllenhaal (Mona Lisa Smilies) star in this number about a couple (Krasinski and Rudolph) searching for the perfect place to raise their family. The reviews have given this movie lots of kudos. The Price Is Right. COME ON DOWN!! And Join me at this film.
item.name: Away We Go
